title: Rename app to SUTRA and update logo + favicon

requirements.summary: Rename all user-facing application naming from “Habitual” to “SUTRA” including browser tab title and key UI headings.
acceptanceCriteria: The main header in `frontend/src/App.tsx` displays “SUTRA” instead of “Habitual”.
The logged-out welcome headline in `frontend/src/App.tsx` displays “Welcome to SUTRA” instead of “Welcome to Habitual”.

file_operations.description: Update the document <title> text to use “SUTRA” (removing “Habitual | Habitual Application”).
Replace user-facing strings in the header and logged-out welcome section from “Habitual” to “SUTRA” / “Welcome to SUTRA” while keeping existing layout and behavior unchanged.

requirements.summary: Add the provided SUTRA logo as a generated asset and display it in the app header instead of the current gradient block + checkmark icon.
acceptanceCriteria: A new generated logo image exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the filename specified in image requirements.
`frontend/src/App.tsx` header displays the new logo image (not the lucide `Check` icon inside the green gradient block).
The logo is sized appropriately for the existing header layout (no overflow, no distortion; preserves aspect ratio).

file_operations.description: Add the generated SUTRA logo image asset (white background, matching the uploaded reference mark; no extra text) at `frontend/public/assets/generated/sutra-logo.dim_512x512.png`.

Swap the current header logo (green gradient square + lucide `Check` icon and its helper styling) with an that references `frontend/public/assets/generated/sutra-logo.dim_512x512.png`, ensuring it preserves aspect ratio and fits the existing header size without overflow or distortion.

requirements.summary: Add a favicon derived from the SUTRA logo and wire it in `index.html` so the browser tab shows the SUTRA icon.
acceptanceCriteria: A favicon image exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the filename specified in image requirements.
`frontend/index.html` includes a `<link rel="icon" ...>` pointing to the generated favicon file.
Reloading the app shows the SUTRA favicon in the browser tab.

file_operations.description: Add the generated square favicon asset derived from the SUTRA logo at `frontend/public/assets/generated/sutra-favicon.dim_32x32.png` (centered with padding on transparent or white background).
Add/update the favicon reference by including a `<link rel="icon" ...>` that points to `frontend/public/assets/generated/sutra-favicon.dim_32x32.png` so browser tabs display the SUTRA icon.
